At my request, Judy has set up a wiki and weblog for our project 
at our Sourceforge website -- which is now conveniently aliased
to:

    http://crawler.archive.org

The wiki is specifically at:

    http://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl

The weblog is specifically at:

    http://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/moveabletype/mt.cgi
    
I expect these to become most useful when we're coordinating
with a larger number of outside collaborators/users.

As you collect useful links/questions/insights about parts
of the crawler and have a chance, please try to enter them into a
suitably-named wiki page. Together with the archives of this
discussion list, it'll provide us with a better project shared 
memory.

- Gordon
